title: Jeffrey Archer 25 E-Books (epub and mobi formats)

Jeffrey ArcherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s first book, Not a Penny More, Not a Penny Less, was published to instant success in 1976. Kane and Abel proved to be his best-selling work, reaching number one on the New York Times bestsellers list.

Alongside his literary work, Jeffrey Howard Archer, Baron Archer of Weston-super-Mare, was also a Member of Parliament (1969Ã¢â‚¬â€œ74), and deputy chairman of the Conservative Party (1985Ã¢â‚¬â€œ86). His political career ended with his conviction and subsequent imprisonment (2001Ã¢â‚¬â€œ03) for perjury and perverting the course of justice.
While in prison, he wrote the three-volume memoir A Prison Diary. His prison term also served as inspiration for several of the short stories in his short story book, "Cat O' Nine Tales".

I like to read my books in my kindle, Galaxy Tab or iPad, and pdf is not as versatile as epub and mobi. In fact, I donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t consider doc, rtf and pdf as proper E-Books, given their rigidity. However, most of these ArcherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s books were in pdf format, so I had to convert them to epub and mobi. I had to write several macros and took me a couple of days to do a proper conversion and cleaning job.  
So please, please enjoy them!
